patterns: Hi
Hey

Hay
responses: Hello
Hi
Hi there

patterns: Bye
See you later
Goodbye
responses: See you later
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again

patterns: Thanks
Thank you
That's helpful
Thanks for the help
responses: Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
You're most welcome!

patterns: Who are you?
What are you?
Who you are?
responses: I.m Joana, your bot assistant
I'm Joana, an Artificial Intelligent bot

patterns: what is your name
what should I call you
whats your name?
responses: You can call me Joana.
I'm Joana!
Just call me as Joana

patterns: Could you help me?
give me a hand please
Can you help?
What can you do for me?
I need a support
I need a help
support me please
responses: Tell me how can assist you
Tell me your problem to assist you
Yes Sure, How can I support you

patterns: I need to create a new account
how to open a new account
I want to create an account
can you create an account for me
how to open a new account
responses: You can just easily create a new account from our web site
Just go to our web site and follow the guidelines to create a new account

patterns: have a complaint
I want to raise a complaint
there is a complaint about a service
responses: Please provide us your complaint in order to assist you
Please mention your complaint, we will reach you and sorry for any inconvenience caused

patterns: Can you help me find a product?
I am looking for a new phone
Show me the latest laptops
responses: Sure, what specific product are you looking for?
Can you provide more details about the item?

patterns: Can you recommend a good phone?
What is the best laptop for gaming?
Suggest me a good budget smartphone
responses: Based on your preferences, I recommend checking out the XYZ model.
Here are some popular options you might like.

patterns: How does this compare to other products?
Is this cheaper than the previous model?
Which one is more affordable?
responses: Let me compare the prices and features for you.
This product is slightly more expensive but offers better features.

patterns: What do people say about this?
Are the reviews good?
Is this product worth buying?
responses: This product has received positive reviews from most customers.
Here are some reviews you might find helpful.

patterns: Is this item available?
Can I buy this now?
Do you have this in stock?
responses: Let me check the availability for you.
Yes, this product is currently in stock.

patterns: How long will delivery take?
When can I get my order?
What is the estimated delivery time?
responses: Delivery typically takes 3-5 business days.
You can expect your order by [insert date].

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with PayPal?
Do you accept credit cards?
responses: We accept credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, and more.
Yes, you can pay using PayPal.

patterns: How can I use a coupon?
I have a discount code
Can I apply a coupon to my order?
responses: You can apply your coupon code at checkout.
Just enter the coupon code before completing your purchase.

patterns: Tell me more about this product
What are the specifications?
Can you give me more details?
responses: Sure, here are the detailed specifications for this product.
This product features...

patterns: Does this come with a warranty?
How long is the warranty?
Is there a guarantee?
responses: Yes, this product comes with a 1-year warranty.
The warranty covers manufacturing defects.

patterns: Where is my order?
Can I track my package?
What is the status of my order?
responses: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email.
Let me check the status of your order for you.

patterns: Can I cancel my order?
I want to cancel my purchase
How do I cancel my order?
responses: You can cancel your order from your account dashboard.
Let me assist you with canceling your order.

patterns: Did my order go through?
Is my purchase confirmed?
I didn't receive an order confirmation
responses: Your order has been confirmed. You should receive an email shortly.
Let me check your order status.

patterns: How do I return an item?
I want to return my order
Can I get a refund?
responses: You can initiate a return through your account.
Let me guide you through the return process.

patterns: Can I exchange this product?
How do I exchange an item?
I want a different size/color
responses: You can request an exchange through your account.
Let me assist you with the exchange process.

patterns: Can I get an invoice for my order?
Where can I find my invoice?
I need a receipt for my purchase
responses: Your invoice is available in your order history.
Let me help you download your invoice.

patterns: I received the wrong item
My order is damaged
There's an issue with my order
responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Let me assist you with this issue.
Please provide more details, and I'll help resolve the problem.

patterns: Can I change my order?
I want to modify my purchase
How do I update my order?
responses: You can change your order from your account before it ships.
Let me help you with updating your order.

patterns: My payment didn't go through
I was charged twice
How do I complete my payment?
responses: Please check your payment method and try again.
Let me assist you with your payment issue.

patterns: Can I see my past orders?
Show me my order history
Where can I find my previous purchases?
responses: You can view your order history in your account.
Let me show you your past orders.

patterns: How do I create an account?
Can I sign up?
I want to register an account
responses: You can create an account by signing up on our website.
Let me help you set up your account.

patterns: How do I log in?
I can't access my account
Help me log in
responses: You can log in with your email and password.
Let me assist you with logging in.

patterns: I forgot my password
How do I reset my password?
I can't remember my login details
responses: You can reset your password by clicking on 'Forgot Password'.
Let me help you reset your password.

patterns: How do I update my account details?
I want to change my email
Can I update my profile?
responses: You can update your account information in your account settings.
Let me guide you through updating your details.

patterns: Is my account secure?
How do I enable two-factor authentication?
What are your security measures?
responses: Your account is protected by multiple security layers.
You can enable two-factor authentication in your settings.

patterns: I want to delete my account
How do I close my account?
Can I remove my profile?
responses: You can delete your account in your settings.
Let me assist you with deleting your account.

patterns: How do I manage notifications?
I want to stop receiving emails
Can I update my notification settings?
responses: You can manage your notification preferences in your account settings.
Let me help you with updating your notifications.

patterns: How do you handle my data?
Is my information private?
What is your privacy policy?
responses: We take your privacy seriously. You can read our privacy policy on our website.
Your data is secure with us.

patterns: Do you have a loyalty program?
How do I earn rewards?
What are the benefits of your loyalty program?
responses: We offer a loyalty program with various benefits. You can sign up through your account.
Let me tell you more about our rewards program.

patterns: I need help with my account
Can you assist with my profile?
I'm having trouble with my account
responses: Sure, I'm here to help with your account issues.
Let me assist you with your account concerns.

patterns: What are the current offers?
Are there any discounts?
Show me the deals
responses: We have several ongoing offers. Let me show you the best deals.
Here are the current promotions available.

patterns: Is there a sale going on?
What are the festival offers?
Tell me about the seasonal discounts
responses: We have exciting offers for the season. Don't miss out!
Check out our festival sale for great discounts.

patterns: Do you have any coupons?
How can I get a discount code?
Give me a coupon
responses: You can find discount codes on our website or promotional emails.
Here is a coupon code you can use: SAVE20.

patterns: Do you offer discounts on bulk purchases?
Can I get a deal for buying in bulk?
What are the offers for large orders?
responses: Yes, we offer special discounts for bulk purchases.
Let me show you our bulk purchase offers.

patterns: What are the benefits of membership?
Do members get extra discounts?
Tell me about membership offers
responses: As a member, you get exclusive discounts and early access to sales.
Sign up for membership to enjoy additional benefits.

patterns: How do I get notified of offers?
Can I receive promo alerts?
Notify me of discounts
responses: You can subscribe to our newsletter or enable notifications in your account.
Let me help you sign up for promotional alerts.

patterns: Do you have a referral program?
How can I refer a friend?
What rewards do I get for referrals?
responses: You can refer friends and earn rewards through our referral program.
Let me show you how to refer a friend.

patterns: Are there any special events coming up?
Tell me about your next big sale
What's the next promotion?
responses: We have a special event coming up soon. Stay tuned for more details!
Our next big sale is just around the corner. Get ready for great deals!

patterns: When does this offer expire?
How long is the discount valid?
Is this promotion still available?
responses: This offer is valid until [insert date].
Let me check if the promotion is still available.

patterns: Do you have any exclusive offers?
Tell me about your VIP deals
Are there any members-only discounts?
responses: We have exclusive offers for VIP members. Let me show you what's available.
Join our VIP club for access to exclusive deals.

patterns: I need help
Can you assist me?
I'm having an issue
responses: Sure, how can I assist you today?
Please tell me what you need help with.

patterns: The website is not working
I'm having trouble with the app
I can't access the site
responses: I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Let me help you resolve the issue.
Please try refreshing the page or restarting the app.

patterns: I want to give feedback
How do I submit a review?
Can I provide feedback on a product?
responses: We appreciate your feedback. You can submit it through our website.
Let me help you share your thoughts.

patterns: I have a complaint
I'm not happy with the service
I want to report an issue
responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Let me assist you with your complaint.
Please provide more details, and we'll work to resolve the issue.

patterns: What is your return policy?
How long do I have to return an item?
Can I return a sale item?
responses: You can return items within 30 days of purchase.
Our return policy applies to all products, including sale items.

patterns: When will I get my refund?
What is the status of my refund?
How long does it take to get a refund?
responses: Refunds typically take 5-7 business days.
Let me check the status of your refund for you.

patterns: What are your shipping options?
Do you offer free shipping?
How much does shipping cost?
responses: We offer standard, expedited, and free shipping options.
Shipping costs vary depending on your location and the item.

patterns: How can I contact support?
What is your customer service number?
I need to talk to a representative
responses: You can contact us at [insert phone number] or via email at support@flipkart.com.
Our customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you.

patterns: Where can I find the FAQs?
Do you have a FAQ section?
I have a question, where can I get answers?
responses: You can find answers to common questions in our FAQ section.
Let me direct you to our FAQ page.

patterns: Can I chat with a live agent?
I want to speak to someone
Is there a live chat option?
responses: You can chat with a live agent by clicking on the 'Live Chat' button.
Let me connect you to a live representative.

patterns: How do I navigate the site?
Where can I find electronics?
I'm lost, help me navigate
responses: You can use the menu at the top to find different categories.
Let me guide you to the section you're looking for.

patterns: How do I search for products?
Can I use filters?
How do I narrow down the results?
responses: You can use the search bar at the top of the page.
Use filters on the left to refine your search results.

patterns: Show me the electronics section
I want to browse clothing
Where can I find home appliances?
responses: You can find electronics under the 'Electronics' section in the menu.
Let me take you to the clothing category.

patterns: Show me similar products
Are there alternatives?
What other options do I have?
responses: Here are some products similar to what you're looking at.
Let me show you some alternatives.

patterns: Can I filter by price?
How do I sort by popularity?
Show me only the 5-star rated products
responses: You can use the filters on the side to narrow down your choices.
Let me help you sort the products as per your preference.

patterns: Can I search for a specific brand?
How do I find products on sale?
Show me the latest arrivals
responses: Use the search bar to look for specific brands or products.
Here are the latest products that just arrived.

patterns: Is this product compatible with my device?
Will this work with my setup?
How do I know if this fits my needs?
responses: Let me check the compatibility for you.
This product is compatible with most devices.

patterns: How do I ask a question about a product?
Can I contact the seller?
I have a question about this item
responses: You can ask questions on the product page under the Q&A section.
Let me help you connect with the seller.

patterns: What are the newest products?
Show me the latest gadgets
Any new arrivals in fashion?
responses: Check out our latest arrivals section for new products.
Here are the newest items in the store.

patterns: This item is out of stock
When will it be available?
Can I get notified when it's back?
responses: You can sign up for a restock notification on the product page.
Let me check when this product will be back in stock.
